title: Handle Post-Stay Feedback
description: A loyalty member sends an email complaining about slow service at the hotel restaurant during their recent stay.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's loyalty profile and recent stay information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the guest and the stay they are referring to.

tasks.description: Draft a response apologizing for the experience and acknowledging their feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes an empathetic and professional response.

tasks.description: As a service recovery gesture, credit bonus points to the guest's loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds goodwill points to the guest's account.
